p: It can be seen that the dispersion of the dielectric constant is absent in SS NCN0.10 in the temperature range of 300–500 K. The ε′/ε 0( T) maximum of NCN0.10 at 470 K ( Fig. 11) corresponds to the phase transition R(M 4)→R(M 2) ( Fig. 2 b). In the cooling mode, the ε′/ε 0 maximum is shifted to the low temperature region by more than 100 K and corresponds to the R(M 2)→R(M 4) phase transition.
